name: JAILBREAK
description: JAILBREAK - is a hardcore 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you have to pass levels for the prisoner. In this game you have to help your hero to escape by collecting keys from different doors.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500MB DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: Intel Core i9 Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 500 MB available space
